name: Need for Speed: Hot Pursuit 2
description: Need For Speed Hot Pursuit 2 houses a stable of exclusive and exotic cars from the world's most coveted licensors including Ferrari, Porsche, and Lamborghini. Drive these cars through Hollywood-styled chases to become the ultimate road racer, then unlock the reward of your choice with the points you collect. But it won't be easy, the opponent racers and the police have distinct and unique driving styles challenging the player to make split-second decisions in order to beat the cops and win the race. For added fun, you can play as the cops and try to bust your friends.
